class.description: A web page that asks for [User] credentials and logs them in by setting cookies. Rendering can be customized by creating the following method: [code]func _render_user_page(request : WebServerRequest, d : Dictionary) -> void:[/code] The [code]d[/code] [Dictionary] will contain the following data on a successful login: [code]d["type"] = "render_login_success"; d["user"] = user;[/code] The [code]d[/code] [Dictionary] will contain the following data normally, or on a failed login attempt: [code]d["type"] = "render_login_request_default"; d["error_str"] = error_str; String, html containing the problems. d["uname_val"] = uname_val; The username input value. d["pass_val"] = pass_val; The password input value.[/code]
